FuncDef: This command configures aa-sub accounting statistics for export of charging groups of a given AA ISA group/partition.

ParaDef.Info: The name of the charging group. The string is case sensitive and limited to 32 ASCII 7-bit printable characters with no spaces.
Specifies that the method of stats export to be used. Values-accounting-policy, radius-accounting-policy.

Allows the operator to enable the referred to a charging group to be selected (via Diameter) for Gx-usage monitoring. Gx usage monitoring is enabled automatically (and this command is not shown) if the export-using parameter is selected for the respective charging group.
